verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* there this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all \add ye of\add* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w* at these \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Amend|strong="H3190"\w* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* and your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, and I will cause you to \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H0982"\w* ye not in \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, The \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, The \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add are\add* these.

For if ye \w throughly|strong="H3190"\w* \w amend|strong="H3190"\w* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* and your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*; if ye \w throughly|strong="H6213"\w* \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* between a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*;

\add If\add* ye \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* not the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, and the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*, and \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* not \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, neither \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* to your \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*:

Then will I cause you to \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
¶ Behold, ye \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, that cannot \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*.

Will ye \w steal|strong="H1589"\w*, \w murder|strong="H7523"\w*, and commit \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, and \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*, and burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* whom ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not;

And \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We are \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*?\f + \fr 7.10 \ft which…: Heb. whereupon my name is called\f*

Is this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, become a \w den|strong="H4631"\w* of \w robbers|strong="H6530"\w* in your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*? Behold, even I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But \w go|strong="H3212"\w* ye now unto my \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which \add was\add* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, where I \w set|strong="H7931"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to it \w for|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And now, because ye have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto you, rising up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w*, but ye \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* not; and I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* you, but ye \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* not;

Therefore will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto \add this\add* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, wherein ye \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*, and unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to you and to your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, as I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*.

And I will cast you \w out|strong="H7993"\w* of my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, as I have cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* all your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add even\add* the whole \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

Therefore \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* not thou for this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, neither lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w cry|strong="H7440"\w* nor \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* for \w them|strong="H1157"\w*, neither make \w intercession|strong="H6293"\w* to me: for I will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thee.

¶ \w Seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou not what they \w do|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*?

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w gather|strong="H3950"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w kindle|strong="H1197"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w knead|strong="H3888"\w* \add their\add* \w dough|strong="H1217"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w cakes|strong="H3561"\w* to the \w queen|strong="H4446"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and to pour \w out|strong="H5258"\w* drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, that they may provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.\f + \fr 7.18 \ft queen…: or, frame, or, workmanship of heaven\f*

Do they provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add do they\add* not \add provoke\add* themselves to the \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w* of their own \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*?

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* shall be poured \w out|strong="H5413"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, upon \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and upon \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and upon the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and upon the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*; and it shall \w burn|strong="H1197"\w*, and shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Put|strong="H5595"\w* your burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto your \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

For I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* not unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, nor \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* or \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*:\f + \fr 7.22 \ft concerning: Heb. concerning the matter of\f*

But this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* I them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Obey|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and I will be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and ye shall be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* ye in all the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* that I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you, that it may be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* unto you.

But they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not, nor \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, but \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w* \add and\add* in the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of their \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and went \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*, and not \w forward|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 7.24 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*\f + \fr 7.24 \ft went: Heb. were\f*

Since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* came forth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* I have even \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto you all my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* rising up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \add them:\add*

Yet they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto me, nor \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, but \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* their \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*: they did \w worse|strong="H7489"\w* than their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Therefore thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto them; but they will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to thee: thou shalt also \w call|strong="H7121"\w* unto them; but they will not \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee.

But thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, This \add is\add* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* that \w obeyeth|strong="H8085"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, nor \w receiveth|strong="H3947"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*: \w truth|strong="H0530"\w* is \w perished|strong="H0006"\w*, and is cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 7.28 \ft correction: or, instruction\f*

¶ Cut \w off|strong="H1494"\w* thine \w hair|strong="H5145"\w*, \add O Jerusalem\add*, and cast \add it\add* \w away|strong="H7993"\w*, and take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w* on high \w places|strong="H8205"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* and \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w* the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: they have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* their \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to \w pollute|strong="H2930"\w* it.

And they have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, to \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \add them\add* not, neither \w came|strong="H5927"\w* it into my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 7.31 \ft came…: Heb. came it upon my heart\f*

¶ Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that it shall no more be \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, nor the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, but the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*: for they shall \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* in \w Tophet|strong="H8612"\w*, till there be \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

And the \w carcases|strong="H5038"\w* of this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* for the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and for the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; and none shall fray \add them\add* \w away|strong="H2729"\w*.

Then will I cause to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and from the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w mirth|strong="H8342"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*: for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H2723"\w*.
